name: code-gnu-global
description: C/C++ Intellisense with the help of GNU Global tags

codegnuglobal.encoding.description: Specify the encoding of the command line output. (Normally it is the code page of Windows non-unicode program if it is not CP437)

codegnuglobal.executable.description: Specify the path to the global executable. (If it is not in PATH already)

codegnuglobal.autoupdate.description: Specify if global should automatically update the tags on file save. (You should turn it off in the workspace settings for large projects)
